analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca hetu pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca hetu sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca hetu upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
